mention.text: Zimbabwe , which De Beers , the South African group that dominates the diamond business , discovered
the South African group that dominates the diamond business
River Ranch , 12km upstream from Beitbridge on the southern border of Zimbabwe
12km upstream from Beitbridge on the southern border of Zimbabwe
River Ranch when they were put up for tender by the Zimbabwe government in 1991
chairman of Redaurum Red Lake Mines , one of the new joint owners of River Ranch
a South African geologist who started his career with De Beers and has 36 years of diamond exploration experience
an Australian-quoted company that he co-founded and where he was once chairman
